member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setViewportMode(AppVarjo::VIEWPORT)
member.summary: Sets the viewport mode, that determines the type of image to be displayed in the viewport.
member.param: Viewport mode. One of the VIEWPORT variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getViewportMode
member.summary: Returns a value indicating the current viewport mode, that determines the type of image to be displayed in the viewport.
member.returns: Current viewport mode. One of the VIEWPORT variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setHeadPositionLock(bool)
member.summary: Locks the head position.
member.param: true to lock the head position.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setHeadRotationLock(bool)
member.summary: Locks the head rotation.
member.param: true to lock the head rotation.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isHeadPositionLocked
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the head position is locked.
member.returns: true if the head position is locked; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isHeadRotationLocked
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the head rotation is locked.
member.returns: true if the head rotation is locked; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getMaxTrackedDeviceCount
member.summary: Returns the maximum value of tracked devices.
member.returns: The maximum value of tracked devices.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerStateAxisCount
member.summary: Returns a number of axes.
member.returns: Number of axes.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDevicePose(int)
member.summary: Returns a single pose for a tracked device.
member.returns: Identity matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDeviceVelocity(int)
member.summary: Returns a device velocity in tracker space, in meters per second.
member.returns: Velocity.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDeviceAngularVelocity(int)
member.summary: Returns a device angular velocity, in radians per second.
member.returns: Angular velocity.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isDeviceConnected(int)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the device connected to the slot.
member.returns: true - connected; false - not connected.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isPoseValid(int)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the device pose is valid.
member.returns: true - valid; false - invalid.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getTrackingResult(int)
member.summary: Returns the value indicating the tracking result: Uninitialized Calibrating in progress Calibrating out of range Running correctly Running out of range
member.returns: Tracking result.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDeviceType(int)
member.summary: Returns the device type.
member.returns: Device type, one of the DEVICE variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getDeviceAxisType(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the value that identifies what type of axis is on the indicated controller.
member.returns: Axis of a corresponding type. One of the AXIS variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerPacketNum(int)
member.summary: Returns the number of the controller packet.
member.returns: Number of the controller packet.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerButtonPressed(int,AppVarjo::BUTTON)
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the specified button is pressed.
member.param: A button, one of the BUTTON variables.
member.returns: true if the button is pressed; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerButtonTouched(int,AppVarjo::BUTTON)
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the specified button is touched.
member.param: A button, one of the BUTTON variables.
member.returns: true if the button is pressed; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerAxis(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the coordinates of the specified controller axis along the X and Y axes.
member.returns: X and Y in the range of [-1;1] ([0;1] for a trigger).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setControllerVibration(int,unsignedshort)
member.summary: Sets the vibration of the given duration and amplitude.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isEyeTrackingValid
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if eye tracking is valid.
member.returns: true if eye tracking is valid; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getFocusWorldPosition
member.summary: Returns the position of the eye focus point in world coordinates.
member.returns: World position of the eye focus point.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.requestCalibration
member.summary: Triggers the gaze calibration sequence, if gaze tracking has been enabled in Varjo settings and the Varjo system is in a state where it can bring up the calibration UI.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getLeftEyeWorldPosition
member.summary: Returns the position of the left eye in world coordinates.
member.returns: World position of the left eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getLeftEyeWorldDirection
member.summary: Returns the direction vector of the left eye in world coordinates.
member.returns: Direction vector of the left eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getRightEyeWorldPosition
member.summary: Returns the position of the right eye in world coordinates.
member.returns: World position of the right eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getRightEyeWorldDirection
member.summary: Returns the direction vector of the right eye in world coordinates.
member.returns: Direction vector of the right eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getGazeWorldDirection
member.summary: Returns the gaze direction vector, which is a combined value for both eyes, in world coordinates.
member.returns: Direction vector for both eyes.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getLeftEyePupilSize
member.summary: Returns the size of the left eye pupil, the value between 0 and 1 calculated according to the pupil size range detected by the Varjo headset.
member.returns: The size of the left eye pupil, the value between 0 and 1.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getRightEyePupilSize
member.summary: Returns the size of the right eye pupil, the value between 0 and 1 calculated according to the pupil size range detected by the Varjo headset.
member.returns: The size of the right eye pupil, the value between 0 and 1.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getCaptureTime
member.summary: Returns the timestamp of when the data was recorded, in nanoseconds.
member.returns: Timestamp of when the data was recorded, in nanoseconds.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getFocusDistance
member.summary: Returns the distance between the eye and the focus point. It is a value between 0 and 2 meters.
member.returns: The distance between the eye and the focus point.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getStability
member.summary: Returns a value between 0.0 and 1.0 specifying the stability of the user’s focus. 0.0 means not stable and 1.0 means stable.
member.returns: A value between 0.0 and 1.0 specifying the stability of the user’s focus. 0.0 means not stable and 1.0 means stable.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getEyeTrackingStatus
member.summary: Returns a value representing the status of eye tracking in the Varjo headsets.
member.returns: Value representing the status of eye tracking in the Varjo headsets, one of the EYETRACKING_STATUS variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getLeftEyeStatus
member.summary: Returns a value representing the tracking status for the left eye.
member.returns: Value representing the tracking status for the left eye, one of the EYE_STATUS variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getRightEyeStatus
member.summary: Returns a value representing the tracking status for the right eye.
member.returns: Value representing the tracking status for the right eye, one of the EYE_STATUS variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getFrameNum
member.summary: Returns a unique identifier of the frame when the data was recorded.
member.returns: Unique identifier of the frame when the data was recorded.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.setVisualizerEnabled(bool)
member.summary: Toggles visualizer.
member.param: true to enable visualizer; false to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.isVisualizerEnabled
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if visualizer is enabled.
member.returns: true if visualizer is enabled; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.getControllerRole(int)
member.summary: Returns a specific role associated with a tracked device.
member.returns: Role associated with a tracked device. One of the CONTROLLER_ROLE variables.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.VIEWPORT_BLACK_SCREEN
member.summary: No image (black screen).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.VIEWPORT_MONO
member.summary: Mono image.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.VIEWPORT_STEREO
member.summary: Stereo image (left and right eye).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.DEVICE_INVALID
member.summary: A tracked device with an invalid index.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.DEVICE_HMD
member.summary: A tracked head-mounted display.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.DEVICE_CONTROLLER
member.summary: A tracked controller.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.DEVICE_GENERIC_TRACKER
member.summary: A tracked tracker device.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.DEVICE_TRACKING
member.summary: A tracked camera and base stations that serve as tracking reference points.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.AXIS_NONE
member.summary: No axis is identified on the controller.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.AXIS_TRACKPAD
member.summary: An axis of a trackpad type.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.AXIS_JOYSTICK
member.summary: An axis of a joystick type.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.AXIS_TRIGGER
member.summary: An axis of a trigger type.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_SYSTEM
member.summary: The system button. These events are not visible to applications and are used internally to bring up the Steam Overlay or the Steam Client.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_APPLICATIONMENU
member.summary: The application menu button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_GRIP
member.summary: The grip button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_DPAD_LEFT
member.summary: The sensor panel left button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_DPAD_UP
member.summary: The sensor panel up button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_DPAD_RIGHT
member.summary: The sensor panel right button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_DPAD_DOWN
member.summary: The sensor panel down button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_A
member.summary: The button reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_AXIS0
member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_AXIS1
member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_AXIS2
member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_AXIS3
member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_AXIS4
member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_STEAMVR_TOUCHPAD
member.summary: The touchpad on the SteamVR controller. It is the same as BUTTON_AXIS0.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_STEAMVR_TRIGGER
member.summary: The trigger on the SteamVR controller. It is the same as BUTTON_AXIS1.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_DASHBOARD_BACK
member.summary: The back to dashboard button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.BUTTON_MAX
member.summary: This is not an actual button. It just indicates the maximum number of buttons in the system.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYETRACKING_STATUS_INVALID
member.summary: Data is not available, user is not wearing the device or eyes cannot be found.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYETRACKING_STATUS_ADJUST
member.summary: User is wearing the device, but gaze tracking is being calibrated.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYETRACKING_STATUS_VALID
member.summary: Data is valid.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYE_STATUS_INVALID
member.summary: Eye is not tracked and not visible (for example, eye is shut).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYE_STATUS_VISIBLE
member.summary: Eye is visible but not reliably tracked (for example, saccade or blink).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYE_STATUS_COMPENSATED
member.summary: Eye is tracked but quality compromised (for example, headset has moved after calibration).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.EYE_STATUS_TRACKED
member.summary: Eye is tracked.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_INVALID
member.summary: Invalid value for controller type.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_LEFT_HAND
member.summary: Tracked device is associated with the left hand.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_RIGHT_HAND
member.summary: Tracked device is associated with the right hand.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_OPT_OUT
member.summary: Tracked device is opting out of left/right hand.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_TREADMILL
member.summary: Tracked device is a treadmill.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVarjo.CONTROLLER_ROLE_MAX
member.summary: Indicates the maximum number of controller roles.
